parameters.name: ActionParams
parameters.description: The action parameter. Set this value in the JSON string format.

parameters.name: EventAction
parameters.description: The event handling action. Set this value to archive or undo.

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The event ID. Separate multiple event IDs with commas (,). You can configure up to 20 event IDs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
